meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Alan Lin David Madden Monica Thieu Pam Mueller Brad Rutter Ken Jennings Colby Burnett Larissa Kelly Matt Jackson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7942.

td.p: Playing the Jeopardy! Round: Alan Lin, a software engineer from Riverside, California
Playing the Double Jeopardy! Round: Pam Mueller, a think tank researcher from Culver City, California
Playing the Final Jeopardy! Round: Colby Burnett, a college counselor from Chicago, Illinois
Playing the Jeopardy! Round: David Madden, an academic competition director from Ridgewood, New Jersey
Playing the Double Jeopardy! Round: Brad Rutter, an actor and producer from Los Angeles, California
Playing the Final Jeopardy! Round: Larissa Kelly, an editor for academic competitions from Richmond, California
Playing the Jeopardy! Round: Monica Thieu, a Ph.D. student in psychology from New York, New York
Playing the Double Jeopardy! Round: Ken Jennings, a writer from Seattle, Washington
Playing the Final Jeopardy! Round: Matt Jackson, a digital fundraising professional from Washington, D.C.

tr.td: WORD HISTORY
PODCASTS
MUSES
A NASDAQ FACT
"M"INENT
DOMAIN

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Colby] It\'s a very significant number for those of us here at Jeopardy!, because this tournament was our way of celebrating our [*]th anniversary.)
[Applause]
(Alex: The 1st, the 13th and the 21st Amendment.)
...
(Colby: [After Team Colby\'s two-day total is revealed] Do you hear the people sing?)
(Alex: Wasn\'t that Jean Valjean\'s number in Les Miserables?)
[Laughter]
(Alex: Oh.)
(Colby: And we bought a loaf of bread.)
ColbyWhat is 1 + 13 + 21 = 35?
$7,001
MattWhat is (1 + 13 + 21 =) 35
$0
LarissaWhat is 35?
$0
35')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
